query:
SELECT e.id, e.title, e.price, l.name as location_name 
FROM events e 
JOIN locations l ON e.location_id = l.id 
ORDER BY l.name, e.title;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3T1zJ51LUnRwksr.root --database PRLTv39ySLt5ijTYKqCuQo --execute SELECT e.id, e.title, e.price, l.name as location_name 
FROM events e 
JOIN locations l ON e.location_id = l.id 
ORDER BY l.name, e.title;
logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'e.location_id' in 'on clause'
